sn23.20:1.2: Seated to one side, Venerable Rādha said to the Buddha:
sn23.20:1.3: “Sir, they speak of things being ‘liable to vanish’.
sn23.20:1.5: “Rādha, form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness are liable to vanish.
sn23.20:1.7: They understand: ‘… there is no return to any state of existence.’”
